game.doublePlay:
You may play two doubles at once.
Do you want to play {tile1} and {tile2} together?

hints.noNeedToGrab:
You have a possible tile to play in your hand.
No need to grab another one.
hints.noMoreGrabsInRow: You grab maximum allowed number of tiles in a row:
hints.noGrabsLastTiles: You cannot grab last {count} tile(s) from the market.

errors.103: No tile with such an id in the hand.
errors.104: The tile can't be played on the table.
errors.106:
The tile {tileId} cannot start the hunt.
You need to play {starters} and if you win it will counts as Goat Victory!

results.0:
{winner} win! Normal victory. 
{loser} is left with {pointsLeft} points.

rules.instruction: Select set of rules that will be applied when new game starts:
rules.maxGrabsInRow: Maximal number of tiles that can be grabbed from the market in a row:
rules.minLeftInMarket: Minimal number of tiles that must remain on the market and cannot be grabbed:
rules.pointsToStartHunt: Number of point that player must be left with that starts a hunt:
rules.workGoat: Allow a work goat lose (a player with certain amount of points lose with goat without a hunt):
rules.totalPointsToLoseWithGoat: Total points that needs to be impose on player to become a work goat:
rules.starterTiles: Tiles that can start game by the priority:
rules.huntStarterTiles: Tiles that can start hunt by the priority:
rules.lastTilePoints: Tiles that can impose additional points if left in the losing hand by itself:
rules.morePointToEndWith: Tiles that can impose additional points on the loser if game ended with it:
